item.title: FT Most Read: Tuesday, November 19, 2024 at 1:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Germany and Finland ‘deeply concerned’ about severed undersea cable
2. Lutnick and Bessent’s battle for Treasury secretary turns bitter as Trump expands field
3. European troops in Ukraine would secure Trump peace deal, says Estonia
4. EU to demand technology transfers from Chinese companies
5. [Opinion] Trump’s attack on the enemy within will delight America’s real foes
